entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LibraryImportGenerator ConvertToLibraryImportAnalyzerTests failing with new function pointer support #71891
  • Test SetValueDirect_GetValueDirectRoundDataTest failed: Expected 222; Actual -1 #71890
  • [wasm] WasmTemplateTests for console failing due to truncated output #71887
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json contract customization: not possible to enable deserialization in properties marked JsonIgnoreCondition.Always #71886
    7.0.0
  • Vector128.Create() codegen: ReadOnlySpan<byte> vs. byte[] overloads #71885
    7.0.0
  • Enum.GetUnderlyingType crashes the runtime on generic arguments constrained as Enums #71884
  • Add Function Pointer support to Native AOT Reflection #71883
  • Can't call NativeLibrary.GetExport with RTLD_DEFAULT on Linux #71881
  • [wasm] `System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests*EventSource_ExistsWithCorrectId` failing on Windows/Chrome #71877
  • ClientWebSocket memory footprint issue on Linux #71876
  • Assertion failed 'argsToReverse' in 'Program:<Main>$(System.String[])' during 'Importation' #71874
  • HttpQSCollection inside of System.Web.HttpUtility has bug in its ToString() #71871
  • Search in Documents folder does not work as expected #71870
  • Dotnet 6.06 install failure #71869

Closed

  • System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.dll doesn't contain source code attributes #52174
    7.0.0
  • Add JsonTypeInfo overloads to System.Memory.Data #54979
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] broken .locals init #71425
    7.0.0
  • Use Portable TimerQueue when using Portable ThreadPool #46266
    7.0.0
  • Performance regression in JsonSerializer.Deserialize(Stream) for very small types like Int32 #59103
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in TryParseInt64 #56020
    7.0.0
  • XmlSchema parsing of <xs:import> nodes does not work #30054
  • [wasm] Tests randomly failing because the results xml was empty #71843
  • Assertion failed 'this->OperIsBinary()' during 'LSRA allocate' #71655
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Testing.Tests crashed: Fatal error. Internal CLR error. #71841
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable System.Xml.Linq.Tests.XTypeDescriptionProviderTests class #39709
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add AggressiveInlining to a couple of Vector.Create methods #71889
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Refactor Rfc2898DeriveBytes to support spans #71888
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Remove GTF_CALL_M_UNMGD_THISCALL and badcode on thiscall with 0 args #71882
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement the ContentLengthReadStream.Length property #71879
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Disable `S.T.RegularExpressions FunctionalTests` tests failing due to linker crash #71875
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Convert a few trivial Type, RuntimeType and Enum FCalls to C# #71873
    area-System.Reflection
  • Do not compact blocks around loops #71868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix converting old SIMD ctors to HWI ones #71865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Use HashCode.Combine instead of ValueTuple.GetHashCode in MatchingState #71859
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Move System.Drawing files from Common to System.Drawing.Primitives #71878
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.12 #70693
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Use the portable timer implementation in CoreCLR #71864
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Use u8 string in CultureNames #71417
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1869991 #71867
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on ARM #71598
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] JSImport and JSExport code gen #71551
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Updating the Generic Math to match final API review feedback #71800
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Do not throw BadImageFormat from the type system #71820
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Enable Rfc2898DeriveBytes on Browser WASM #71768
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Handle unary operator GT_CNEG_LT in few code paths #71845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move _OOP_find_proc_info to libunwind #71465
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enabled `System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.Tests`. #71821
    arch-wasm, area-System.ComponentModel
  • Add an Azure NPM registry #71393
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #71516
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • Vectorize Convert.ToBase64String #71795
  • [NativeAOT] thread suspension on Unix #71187
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add tests for OAEP encryption with non-power-of-two key sizes #71699
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Propagate typeof() during inlining #71778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • createdump improvements for better VS4Mac Watson bucketing #71863
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Make Type.GetTypeCode/IsEnum intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove ThreadPool native implementation #71719
    area-System.Threading
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Pass CancellationToken to Http2Connection SetupAsync #70906
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Implement HTTP/2 WebSockets #70895
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • DCS alignment to 4.8 with schema support #71752
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • tasks/Utils.cs: Add support for logging errors/warnings from process #71814
    area-Build-mono
  • Add Kerberos loopback test #71824
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix annotation on XmlElement constructor parameter #71860
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update string marshallers to V2 shape #71849
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Rebucket tests that fail with NativeAOT and fix some #71819
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • Fix SerialPort memory leak when requests time out and no data is received #68014
    area-System.IO, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Update upstream ref for arm fp unwind support #71857
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can not find the installed .NET SDK on raspberry pi 3b to run .NET app on VS Code #26487

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix typo in PackageValidatorOption.cs #26486

Merged

  • Change linker to trim everything by default in 7.0 #26246
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Support for msbuild/build event #26427
    Area-NetSDK
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.App from 2.2.0 to 2.2.6 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/RazorSimpleMvc22 #26484
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A `ref T` field where `T` is `unmanaged` is itself treated as `unmanaged` #62528
  • CodeNamespace.Members does not include records #62523
  • Possibly incorrect comment in definite assignment #62522

PullRequests

Created

  • Generate ReadyToRun binaries for OOP #62518
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62525
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62527
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62526
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62521
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62520
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62519
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Enable nullable for classes under Rename folder #62453
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62515
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62517
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62516
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add a GH issue template for localization suggestions. #62512
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #62533
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #62532
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #62531
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #62530
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #62529
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Use secondary buffer in contained language file paths #62488
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add LanguageVersion.CSharp11 #62496
    Area-Compilers
  • Node Selection Incomplete member and Global Statement fix #62509
    Bug, Area-IDE
  • Use "file local types" instead of "file types" #62514
    Area-Compilers
  • Provide parse options to the language service more quickly #60855
    Area-Compilers
  • [WIP] improve test partitioning #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow Roslyn to access any evaluation properties and items #62445
    Area-IDE
  • When we're removing the last project, fire SolutionCleared #62257
    Area-IDE
  • Immediately filter syntax trees down to those that either have attributes or global-using-aliases. #62483
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-09
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Use of [AsParameters] attribute #42605
  • Blazor Wasm Microsoft.JSInterop.JSException: Could not find 'blazorCulture.get' #42574
  • Scoped CSS import order is incorrect #42626
  • Member-level trimming breaks ASP.NET tracing instrumentation #42434
    7.0-preview7

Updated

  • ASP.NET Core SPA Templates Need Better Options for Authentication #42158
  • Add APIs to make it possible for users of RouteEndpointBuilder to use filters #42592
    .NET 7 Planning
  • dotnet 6 angular template does not work out of the box #42632
  • Design for solving transient disposables on Blazor Server #26676
    7.0-preview7
  • ARC App Service cannot authenticate to AAD #42631
  • Automate localization for resources in templates using Arcade infrastructure #36998
    7.0-preview7
  • Blazor WASM ignores the Base Href when trying to fetch hot-reload script #39554
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update custom marshallers for source-generated interop to the V2 shapes. #42619
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1870306 #42636
    area-mvc
  • Allow cancellation of navigation events in Blazor #42638
    area-blazor
  • Make RateLimitingMiddleware endpoint aware #42417
    area-runtime
  • Fix CollectionModelBinder BindSimpleCollection null value handling #42278
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Improve Default Blazor WebAssembly Loading Experience #42548
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview7
  • Route tooling #42597
    area-web-frameworks
  • Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Adding ProblemDetailsService #42384
    area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand in CollectionView is not triggered on Windows #8627
  • TextColor of Label does not change with VisualStateManger inside CollectionView #8626
  • Bug: Styling for Border Control is not working #8625
  • Intelisense / HotReload #8624
  • Entry/Editor do not lose focus -- ContentView Binding #8623
  • Slider not working in latest Mac Catalyst #8620
  • Setting Page.IsBusy to true is not displaying waiting indicator #8617

Closed

  • New project in 17.3.0 preview 2 won't restore #8622
  • Mac Catalyst Remove existing MenuBarItem #7919

PullRequests

Created

  • [Shell] Fixes for Shell issues with iOS and Mac #8618

Updated

  • Fix SwitchCell not compliant with best accessibility practices #6899
    area/a11y, community ✨, 6.0-servicing
  • Fix DatePicker on iOS so that it can GC #8476
    area/controls 🎮
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #8603
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • I am trying to build Error RS2003 Rule 'EF1001' was shipped in analyzer release '3.0.0', but is no longer a supported diagnostic for any analyzer. Add an entry for this rule in a 'Removed Rules' table to unshipped file. EFCore.Analyzers #28408
  • Visual Studio Package Manager Console EFCore Tools not working #28407
  • Improve workflow of Temporal Rollback #28405
  • Simplify single data deletion code #28404

Closed

  • Don't overwrite reference when querying for old principal #27497
    7.0.0
  • New entity is not saved under certain conditions #26937
    7.0.0
  • Nullable reference with DeleteBehavior.Cascade that is deleted is reloaded back after DetectChanges #26827
    7.0.0
  • EF Core probably should have an option to not log `OperationCanceledException`s #28406
  • Sqlite migrations: table rebuild with spatial column errors out #28384
  • SQL Server: Translate statistics aggregate functions #28104
    7.0.0
  • Translate string.Join and string.Concat #2981
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Don't overwrite reference when querying for old principal #28395
  • Custom aggregate translations #28110
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Add support for CSharpHelper for Dictionary literals #28330
  • Unidirectional many-to-many relationships #28371
  • feat: validate reserve invalid file characters on migrations name #28367
  • Translate x.parse #28337
  • Scaffolding: Refactor some code #28358

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Visual Studio MAUI Comet Template renders blank screen on Windows Machine #238
